sentence.english: She doesn't work on Monday because it's her day off.
sentence.spanish: Ella no trabaja el lunes porque es su día libre.

sentence.english: Are they meeting for lunch every Tuesday?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se reúnen para almorzar todos los martes?

sentence.english: He was studying English every Wednesday last semester.
sentence.spanish: Él estudiaba inglés todos los miércoles el semestre pasado.

sentence.english: I'm not going to the gym this Thursday.
sentence.spanish: No voy al gimnasio este jueves.

sentence.english: Were you going to the cinema every Friday last month?
sentence.spanish: ¿Ibas al cine todos los viernes el mes pasado?

sentence.english: They are having a party next Saturday.
sentence.spanish: Ellos tienen una fiesta el próximo sábado.

sentence.english: Does he always visit his family on Sunday?
sentence.spanish: ¿Visita él siempre a su familia los domingos?
